infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Chapterly uses the camera to scan book barcodes and add books to your library.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Chapterly may access your photo library to save book covers or reading progress images.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Chapterly may use the microphone for voice notes or audio features.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Chapterly may use location to provide location-based reading recommendations.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationUsageDescription: Chapterly sends daily reading reminders to help you maintain your reading streak.
